title: Shelf Marks
text:
Shelf Marks
Each book in the library's collection has a shelf mark that indicates its location. With the exception of a small collection in the open stacks (basement), our books are arranged according to the
[Regensburger Verbundklassifikation (RVK)](https://rvk.uni-regensburg.de/regensburger-verbundklassifikation-online) - a classification system widely used in academic libraries in Germany (overview [RVK in English](https://rvk.uni-regensburg.de/images/stories/RVKO_Informationen/q_wirtschafts_systematik_fichtel_2013.pdf)).
For economics, the main group Q is primarily relevant. Books whose subject matter spills over into other fields may also be classified under other main groups such as mathematics (S) or social sciences (M). In bonnus you can search across libraries with the help of RVK system locations (example: Advanced search - RVK-Notation: QH 100).
The most important RVK signatures of our books
[QB](https://bonnus.ulb.uni-bonn.de/Summon/Search?join=AND&bool0%5B%5D=AND&lookfor0%5B%5D=QB*&type0%5B%5D=LCCallNumUNI&sort=PublicationDate%3Adesc&filter%5B%5D=Library%3A%22Staatswiss.+Sem.%22)
- General Economics
- Economic Methodology
- Economics Education and Teaching of Economics
[QC](https://bonnus.ulb.uni-bonn.de/Summon/Search?join=AND&bool0%5B%5D=AND&lookfor0%5B%5D=QC*&type0%5B%5D=LCCallNumUNI&sort=PublicationDate%3Adesc&filter%5B%5D=Library%3A%22Staatswiss.+Sem.%22)

[QD](https://bonnus.ulb.uni-bonn.de/Summon/Search?join=AND&bool0%5B%5D=AND&lookfor0%5B%5D=QD*&type0%5B%5D=LCCallNumUNI&sort=PublicationDate%3Adesc&filter%5B%5D=Library%3A%22Staatswiss.+Sem.%22)

- Economic Systems
[QE](https://bonnus.ulb.uni-bonn.de/Summon/Search?join=AND&bool0%5B%5D=AND&lookfor0%5B%5D=QE*&type0%5B%5D=LCCallNumUNI&sort=PublicationDate%3Adesc&filter%5B%5D=Library%3A%22Staatswiss.+Sem.%22)

[QF](https://bonnus.ulb.uni-bonn.de/Summon/Search?join=AND&bool0%5B%5D=AND&lookfor0%5B%5D=QF*&type0%5B%5D=LCCallNumUNI&sort=PublicationDate%3Adesc&filter%5B%5D=Library%3A%22Staatswiss.+Sem.%22)

[QG](https://bonnus.ulb.uni-bonn.de/Summon/Search?join=AND&bool0%5B%5D=AND&lookfor0%5B%5D=QG*&type0%5B%5D=LCCallNumUNI&sort=PublicationDate%3Adesc&filter%5B%5D=Library%3A%22Staatswiss.+Sem.%22)

- Country Statistics and Regional Statistics
- Economic Policy in Individual Countries (Statements included)
[QH](https://bonnus.ulb.uni-bonn.de/Summon/Search?join=AND&bool0%5B%5D=AND&lookfor0%5B%5D=QH*&type0%5B%5D=LCCallNumUNI&sort=PublicationDate%3Adesc&filter%5B%5D=Library%3A%22Staatswiss.+Sem.%22)
- Economic Accounting Mathematics
- Statistics
- Econometrics
- Operations Research

[QT](https://bonnus.ulb.uni-bonn.de/Summon/Search?join=AND&bool0%5B%5D=AND&lookfor0%5B%5D=QT*&type0%5B%5D=LCCallNumUNI&sort=PublicationDate%3Adesc&filter%5B%5D=Library%3A%22Staatswiss.+Sem.%22)

[QU](https://bonnus.ulb.uni-bonn.de/Summon/Search?join=AND&bool0%5B%5D=AND&lookfor0%5B%5D=QU*&type0%5B%5D=LCCallNumUNI&sort=PublicationDate%3Adesc&filter%5B%5D=Library%3A%22Staatswiss.+Sem.%22)

[QV](https://bonnus.ulb.uni-bonn.de/discovery/search?query=holding_call_number,contains,QV,AND&tab=Everything&search_scope=MyInst_and_CI&sortby=date_d&vid=49HBZ_ULB:DEFAULT&facet=library,include,6467%E2%80%93112349100006467&mode=advanced&offset=0)
- Labor Economics
[QW](https://bonnus.ulb.uni-bonn.de/discovery/search?query=holding_call_number,contains,QW,AND&tab=Everything&search_scope=MyInst_and_CI&sortby=date_d&vid=49HBZ_ULB:DEFAULT&facet=library,include,6467%E2%80%93112349100006467&mode=advanced&offset=0)

[QX](https://bonnus.ulb.uni-bonn.de/discovery/search?query=holding_call_number,contains,QX,AND&tab=Everything&search_scope=MyInst_and_CI&sortby=date_d&vid=49HBZ_ULB:DEFAULT&facet=library,include,6467%E2%80%93112349100006467&mode=advanced&offset=0)

[QY](https://bonnus.ulb.uni-bonn.de/discovery/search?query=holding_call_number,contains,QY,AND&tab=Everything&search_scope=MyInst_and_CI&sortby=date_d&vid=49HBZ_ULB:DEFAULT&facet=library,include,6467%E2%80%93112349100006467&mode=advanced&offset=0)
- Regional Economic Policy
- City Planning
Special Shelf Marks & Office Reference Collection ("Special Locations")
Besides the shelf marks mentioned above, there are some special features:
- If the library is listed as "Staatswissenschaftliches Seminar ... > Handapparat S ...", this is a reference library - please contact them if you want to borrow a book.
- The signatures Bsc, Dipl and Msc refer to theses at the department of the University of Bonn, the signature Dis to our dissertations.
- I, IV and V refer to special holdings such as periodicals.
- Shelf marks beginning with A, B, C and D refer to a small part of the open stacks (basement) that is still arranged according to the old system.
Newspapers
(Reading room for current volumes / Open stacks for older volumes)
Statistical yearbooks
(Open stacks)
Financial Reports & Law Collections
(Open stacks)
General economic theory
(Open stacks)
Dogmatic History and Methodology of National Economics & Festschriften
(Open stacks)
Bachelor theses (Reading room)
Special economic theory
(Open stacks)
Monetary, currency, credit and economic problems
(Open stacks)
Diploma theses
(Reading room)
Bonn dissertations
(Open stacks)
Master theses
(Reading room)
These books are books published before 1900.
Please contact our Library team or send an email to
[Petra Störring](https://www.econ.uni-bonn.de/sws/de/kontakt/kontakt).
